title: Login screen stuck on loading
body:
Hello.

For the past few days, whenever I try to log in, I enter my username and pw, and the loggin screen stays stuck on the loading phase with the circle going around, any idea what I could do?

replies.body: Hello, you maybe had the same issue as me, try to make a hard reboot of your internext box

Your connection might be having some problems getting through to our authentication servers.  This can happen for a lot of reasons like blocks or instability, so go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities and fix this up!
